definition: defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works

sentences.english: What about the fortifications at Verdun and Metz?
sentences.chinese: 那凡爾登與梅斯的防禦工事呢？

sentences.english: What did Channy think of the defence work?
sentences.chinese: 切尼怎樣看待防禦工事？

sentences.english: The beach defences were softened up before the landing craft was in.
sentences.chinese: 在登陸艇駛入以前，海灘防禦工事已遭削弱。

sentences.english: Israel says Hamas, which will be used to build fortifications.
sentences.chinese: 以色列稱，它們將被哈馬斯用來修築防禦工事。

sentences.english: To carry out landslip preventive works which include earthworks for slopes within country park.
sentences.chinese: 在郊野公園內進行防止山泥傾瀉工程，包括土木工事。

sentences.english: All the strategic passes in the mountains are fortified.
Earthworks and building works in the Lantau South Country Park.
sentences.chinese: 於南大嶼山郊野公園內進行土木工事及建築工程。

sentences.english: A fuze delay allows penetration of dense woods and light earthworks.
sentences.chinese: 用於炮彈穿透濃密的林木和輕型土木工事。

sentences.english: That night (27 -28 June) defensive works were thrown up in selected places near Berestko.
sentences.chinese: 當夜，選定在別列斯科奇附近地方建立防禦工事。

sentences.english: In order to destroy the AA emplacements , you'll need to first deal with the anti-tank fortifications.
sentences.chinese: 爲了破壞機管局進駐，你需要先與反坦克防禦工事。

sentences.english: The city's defenses were too strong.
sentences.chinese: 維克斯堡城的防禦工事實在是太堅固了。

sentences.english: This practice of filling up corners of the wall is much in use in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 這種防護牆角的填高工事在巴黎是相當普遍的。

sentences.english: We outflanked the enemy on the left.
sentences.chinese: 防禦工事的左側或右側。

sentences.english: Earthworks and building works wholly in Sai Kung East Country Park.
sentences.chinese: 於西貢東郊野公園內進行土木工事及建築工程。

sentences.english: To carry out ground investigation works which include earthworks within country parks.
sentences.chinese: 在郊野公園內進行探土工程，包括土木工事。

sentences.english: These fortifications were all built during the last war.
sentences.chinese: 這些防禦工事都是上次戰爭時修的。

definition: pillbox (military fortification)/blockhouse/euphemistic way of writing 屌爆[diao3 bao4]
